00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <stdexcept>
00010 #include "lsf/basic/macro.hpp"
00011 #include "lsf/container/detail/basic_container.hpp"
00012 #include "lsf/container/detail/impl_static_array.hpp"
00013 #include "lsf/container/shared_mem.hpp"
00014 
00015 namespace lsf {
00016 namespace container {
00017 
00019 // Array
00021 template <typename ElemType, typename StoreType = SharedMem, typename SizeType = size_t>
00022 class Array : public detail::BasicContainer<ElemType, SizeType, StoreType, detail::StaticArrayState<ElemType, SizeType>,
00023                                             detail::StaticArrayIterator<ElemType, SizeType>> {
00024 public:
00025     using base_type = detail::BasicContainer<ElemType, SizeType, StoreType, detail::StaticArrayState<ElemType, SizeType>,
00026                                    detail::StaticArrayIterator<ElemType, SizeType>>;
00027     using value_type = typename base_type::value_type;
00028     using size_type = typename base_type::size_type;
00029     using iterator = typename base_type::iterator;
00030     using reverse_iterator = typename base_type::reverse_iterator;
00031 
00032 public:
00033     // access func
00034     value_type& operator[](size_type index) {
00035         if (index >= base_type::max_size()) throw std::runtime_error(LSF_DEBUG_INFO);
00036         return *(base_type::_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(index));
00037     }
00038 
00039     value_type const& operator[](size_type index) const {
00040         if (index >= base_type::max_size()) throw std::runtime_error(LSF_DEBUG_INFO);
00041         return *(base_type::_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(index));
00042     }
00043 
00044     value_type& Get(size_type index) {
00045         if (index >= base_type::max_size()) throw std::runtime_error(LSF_DEBUG_INFO);
00046         return *(base_type::_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(index));
00047     }
00048 
00049     value_type const& Get(size_type index) const {
00050         if (index >= base_type::max_size()) throw std::runtime_error(LSF_DEBUG_INFO);
00051         return *(base_type::_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(index));
00052     }
00053 
00054     value_type* GetPtr(size_type index) {
00055         if (index >= base_type::max_size()) return nullptr;
00056         return base_type::_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(index);
00057     }
00058 
00059     value_type const* GetPtr(size_type index) const {
00060         if (index >= base_type::max_size()) return nullptr;
00061         return base_type::_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(index);
00062     }
00063 
00064     // iterator
00065     iterator begin() { return iterator(base_type::_ptr_state, 0); }
00066     iterator end() { return iterator(base_type::_ptr_state, base_type::max_size()); }
00067 
00068     reverse_iterator rbegin() { return reverse_iterator(end()); }
00069     reverse_iterator rend() { return reverse_iterator(begin()); }
00070 };
00071 
00072 }  // end of namespace container
00073 }  // end of namespace lsf
00074
